Hieroglyphs are a kind of pictograph. Kind of. They started off in Egypt as pictographs and ideograms, but became a syllabary. They later were adopted by others and became an alphabet, but by that time they weren’t really the original hieroglyphs. Pictograms are symbols that represent objects or things. They are basically simplified, standardized, pictures.
